nulledAt.description: Null route date in UTC in format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ

nulledBy.description: Email address of the user who created the null route or 'LeaseWeb' if null route was created by LeaseWeb.

nullLevel.description: Null route permission level. If greater than 1 then the null route can only be removed by LeaseWeb.

automatedUnnullingAt.description: The date and time when the null route is to be automatically removed.

unnulledAt.description: The date and time when the null route has been removed. If null then the null route is still active.

unnulledBy.description: Email address of the user who removed the null route or 'LeaseWeb' if null route was removed by LeaseWeb.

ticketId.description: Reference stored with the null route.

comment.description: Comment stored with the null route.

equipmentId.description: ID of the equipment which was assigned to the IP at the time of null route creation.
